Henry Antoun Barakat (11 June 1914, Cairo - 27 May 1997, Cairo) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Egypt a ma ama
A mụrụ ya na Shubra nye nna Melkite Greek Catholic nke sitere na Syro-Lebanese, na nne Syro-Libanese
Antoun Barakat, bụ dọkịta ma nata aha Beik site n'aka Eze maka ọrụ ọ rụrụ., Ọ duziri ụfọdụ n'ime ihe nkiri ndị a ma ama na Cinema Egypt.
Emume ihe nkiri mba ụwa nke Berlin
Ihe nrite nkwalite nke Egypt State na Arts na Letters nke Supreme Council of Culture, 1995.
Ihe nkiri kacha mma nke Egypt, ihe nkiri ịrị na ise kacha mma nke Egyptian n'oge niile
